galaxy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: one of the large groups of stars that make up the universe
galaxy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a large number of things that are similar
galaxy.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a galaxy of British artistic talent
galaxy.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a type of chocolate bar made of light-brown chocolate by the British company Rowntree
galaxy.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a type of people carrier (=a large car that can carry seven or eight people) made by Ford, which is especially popular in the UK with families
